page.title: 08Leisure & Recreation
page.content:
Eltham is fortunate in having not only leisure facilities of its own,but in being surrounded by places equally well catered for.People in Eltham often venture into surrounding districts for such things as swimming pools/Aquazooms ,ice skating,fairs etc.Also,with easy access into the centre of London,we have the choice of everything offered there such as restaurants,theatres, concerts and exhibitions.Eltham itself is able to offer youth centres,a cinema ,libraries,tennis courts,two swimming pools,extensive woods and parks,and a high street full of good shops.
Dom Laycock Toby Richardson Antony Moore Crown Woods School.
